typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		full_path as string,
		last_modified as timestamp,
		last_modified_iso as string,
		last_modified_timestamp as double,
		name as long,
		size as string,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> AzureBlobStorageSecFilings
AzureBlobStorageSecFilings derive(each(match(name=='name'), $$ = toString($$)),
		size = '$$') ~> ModifyColumns1
ModifyColumns1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name!='last_modified_iso'&&name!='last_modified_timestamp'&&name!='size'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveLastModifiedColumns
RemoveLastModifiedColumns derive(each(match(name=='full_path'), $$ = split($$, '/')[0]),
		each(match(name=='full_path'), $$ = split($$, '.')[1])) ~> CreateOtherColumns
